(Sorry about the quality of this post, I was just about finished with it, 
took me a good 20 minutes while talking with another person and such, when my 
server said some kind of error, and didn't give me the option to save it, so 
if you can all understand, I am really angry, so this will be a short message 
due to how angry I am)


Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Koga Shuko/Scattershot/Unitron/Anubis/Hades:


Nemesis Enforcer stopped, as did all the people following him.  Activating 
his com, he spoke to Zardus.  <Zardus, this is Nemesis Enforcer, I'm seeing 
that that weirdo Dracona has built himself a small base.  I'm going to crush 
it with Oblitertron.  I'll bring a head or something.

Koga Shuko and CO stepped out of the bushes, Nemesis and them speaking 
(deciding to ally for the moment, Koga wanting the energy from Plintissa's 
base, and Nemesis not sure if he really minded, so they agree on a temporary 
Alliance).

Breakdown, Hiss, and Scavneger circled around, meeting up with the other 
side.  Everyone getting their most destructive weapons and reloading weapons, 
they attacked:

Nemesis Enforcer yelled really loud:  "ALL NON-DRACONA AFFILIATED PEOPLE, 
LEAVE, OR DIE, THIS BASE AND ITS FOLLOWERS WILL BE CRUSHED BY THE ALLIANCE, 
BY ORDER OF THE HIGH-KING ZARDUS!!!"

Koga Shuko, Anubis, Hades, and Unitron, with reloaded missile launchers, each 
fired a rocket off at the People's base.

Nemesis Enforcer raised his own missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the 
People's base.

Scattershot lifted off into the air, throwing two charges set to explode on 
impact off at the People's base.

Dark One fired off 25 explosive rounds at the People's base (from left to 
right along the base), leaping into the air.

Breakdown fired off two grenades from his grenade launcher, leaping off after 
Dark One.

Pyro fired off two bursts of 'explosive' flames, still in dragon mode, 
flapping his leathery wings after Dark One.

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at the People's base, leaping into the 
air, tossing a charge set to explode on impact off at the enemy base.

Scavenger raised his missile launcher, getting down on one knee, firing off a 
rocket at the enemy base, lifting off into the air with a jump.


(The next time they form, it will be much more descriptive)

    Forming the head, shoulders, and torso (chest and abdomen and hip)), Dark 
One began to fall to the ground, Breakdown transforming into an arm, 
attatching as the right arm, Pyro doing the same, only attatching as the left 
arm.  Hiss transformed into a leg, attatching to the right side of the hip as 
the right leg, Scavenger attatching as the left leg.

    Slamming to the ground, was a extremely heavy 45 ft tall gestalt, 
slamming a fist to itself, Nemesis almost falling, but regaining his balance, 
a little marvelled.

Koga Shuko sighed.  "My technology, used for a group of lowly 
mercenaries...still this will be intersting to watch.

    Oblitertron, the newly formed gestalt, yelled loudly, slamming another 
fist against his chest.  "I live for obliteration!" he yelled, pulling out a 
huge sword from subspace (whatever the length of a sword is for say a 7 ft 
tall person is, it's the same for the 45 foot tall one, only for its size).
